soot.jimple.infoflow.methodSummary.data.provider

Class MemorySummaryProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.infoflow.methodSummary.data.provider.MemorySummaryProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMethodSummaryProvider

    public class MemorySummaryProvider
extends Object
implements IMethodSummaryProvider
    Provider class that reads method summaries from in-memory data structures
    Author:
    Steven Arzt

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MethodSummaries getClassFlows(String clazz)
      Gets all summaries for all methods in the given class
      Set<String> getLoadableClasses()
      Gets the names of all classes for which summaries have not yet been loaded, but are available on some external storage
      ClassSummaries getMethodFlows(Set<String> classes, String methodSignature)
      Gets all flows for the given method signature in the given set of classes
      MethodSummaries getMethodFlows(String className, String methodSubSignature)
      Gets the data flows inside the given method for the given class.
      Set<String> getSupportedClasses()
      Gets the names of all classes for which this provider can directly return method summaries
      boolean supportsClass(String clazz)
      Gets whether the given class is supported by this provider, i.e., whether summaries for that class have either already been loaded or can be loaded

      • supportsClass

        public boolean supportsClass(String clazz)
        Description copied from interface: IMethodSummaryProvider

        Returns:

        Specified by:
        getMethodFlows in interface IMethodSummaryProvider
        Parameters:
        className - The class containing the method. If two classes B and C inherit from some class A, methods in A can either be evaluated in the context of B or C.
        Returns:
        The flow summaries for the given method in the given class
